E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Eddie Hughs
Dear Sir,
Eddie Hughs has an ERA of 2.48 at A Marshall Thundering Herd!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Monday, 5/5/1984
Subject: So you want to get rid of me...
...fine. This is how you treat a player who

Regards,
Romeo Ramirez



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1984
Subject: Eddie Hughs healing process
Eddie Hughs is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1984
Subject: Playing time
Manager,
I am not very happy about my playing time recently.
I think I deserve a starting spot!

Regards,
Wenceslao Martinez



Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1984
Subject: Herman Mckechnie injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Scratched Cornea Eye.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Friday, 5/23/1984
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Samuel Rodriguez



Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1984
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Deon Castillo
